item.description:
Hello Conscious Creators!

It seems to me that so many people have turned away from Religion and yet long for that connection to something higher, greater than ourselves which many at one point in their life called GOD. Today, just the word "GOD", seems to leave many people feeling uncomfortable. It would appear that Religious Institutions have insisted that we surrender our will to them, rather than God, leaving many of us deeply wounded & searching for a reconnection to the Divine. 

So, How do we reconnect to the Divine God? Is there a way to reunite Religion & Spirituality?

We will explore the difference between Religion & Spirituality.                                      

Gain an understanding of who we really are

Begin to a new process of communcating and listening to our Higher Divine Self, God. 

See you there!

If this is your first time attending, Please call.
Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: We will disclose location after signing up

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Exploring the Difference Between Religion & Spirituality
